snippet: Donald Sterling sued the celebrity website TMZ and his former girlfriend V. Stiviano over the recording of his remarks on race that cost him ownership of the Los Angeles Clippers.
abstract: Former Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling files suit against his former girlfriend V Stiviano and gossip website TMZ over recording of remarks he made about race.
lead_paragraph: Donald Sterling sued the celebrity website TMZ and his former girlfriend V. Stiviano over the recording of his remarks on race that cost him ownership of the Los Angeles Clippers.
